sec.label: C.6
sec.title: Information to be recorded and reported
sec.p: The test record and report shall contain the information required by the basic standards used to determine the sound power level and the emission sound pressure level at operator’s position.
Additionally, the test record and report shall state:

list-item.p: the rated power of the rig;
the number and type of drill heads/rock drills and drill steel/rod types;
type of fan-drive system, as specified in C.2.3 a), b) or c), including the corresponding system maximum fan speed and fan speeds used during the test for each fan;
set-up of air-conditioning and pressurised ventilation system;
normal speed as specified by manufacturer for auxiliary equipment;
data necessary to operate the machine at its tested performance level.

sec.p: Deviations, if any, from this noise test code shall be recorded and reported in detail together with justification for these deviations.
